CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 6, 1948, pg. 2, reads: "Centenarians Cast Their Votes - Civil War Vet - Right in thick of the voting was Civil War veteran David Wilson of 2426 Centre Avenue, who says he was born in 1848. Shown, with him are Mrs. Nannie G. Moone and John Thompson, city detective. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Nannie G. Moone holding arm of centenarian David Wilson, with detective John Thompson in background, in doorway of polling place
